snippet: It doesn’t put much stock in so-called fundamentals; it’s based almost entirely on polls....
abstract: The Upshot; New York Times' internal presidential prediction model says Hillary Clinton has 76 percent chance of defeating Donald J Trump in 2016 presidential race; model uses statistical research and calculations for data, including extensive look at voting history of each state and about 300 state and national polls conducted since mid-April.
lead_paragraph: It doesn’t put much stock in so-called fundamentals; it’s based almost entirely on polls.

headline.print_headline: The Upshot’s Election Forecast: 76% Chance of a Clinton Victory
headline.main: Introducing The Upshot’s Presidential Prediction Model
